metadata.title: COLHYBRI — Financial Inclusion Through Local Commerce
metadata.description: COLHYBRI connects financially excluded individuals with local shops through a £2.50/month subscription, creating a community-powered financial ecosystem. Part of ONLYMORE Group ($12.5M+ ARR, 520,000 clients).

hero.headline: Every pound spent locally creates £2.50 in community value
hero.subheadline: COLHYBRI connects financially excluded individuals with neighbourhood shops through a simple £2.50/month subscription. Together, we build financial inclusion from the ground up.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.headline: Doing Our Part — Like the Hummingbird
mission.description: In a Native American legend, while the forest burns, the hummingbird carries water drop by drop. When asked why, it replies: "I am doing my part." COLHYBRI embodies this spirit — small actions by many create massive collective impact.

inclusion.title: Financial Inclusion
inclusion.description: Approximately 1.3 million adults in the UK lack access to a basic bank account, and millions more are financially excluded. COLHYBRI provides affordable access to essential financial services for just £2.50/month — no credit check, no minimum balance.

commerce.title: Local Commerce
commerce.description: Local shops become community financial hubs. Every transaction through COLHYBRI strengthens the neighbourhood economy through the Keynesian multiplier effect.

community.title: Community Power
community.description: When individuals and shops connect through COLHYBRI, money circulates locally. Every £1 spent generates £2.50 in local economic activity.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.headline: Three Simple Steps to Financial Inclusion

subscribe.title: Subscribe
subscribe.description: Individuals join for £2.50/month. No credit check, no bank account needed. Instant access to the COLHYBRI community financial network.

connect.title: Connect Locally
connect.description: Shops join for £8/month and become community financial hubs. They offer COLHYBRI services alongside their existing business.

thrive.title: Thrive Together
thrive.description: Every transaction multiplies. The Keynesian multiplier turns each £2.50 subscription into £6.25 in local economic value.

impact.title: Impact
impact.headline: The Keynesian Multiplier in Action
impact.description: Every pound that circulates locally generates 2.5x its value in economic activity. COLHYBRI channels spending into local commerce, creating jobs and strengthening communities.

jobsCreated.label: Per 200 active subscribers in a neighbourhood

moneyLocal.label: Of spending stays in the community

miami.title: UK Launch 2026
miami.headline: COLHYBRI Launches in the UK — Revitalising the High Street
miami.description: The United Kingdom, with 67 million inhabitants, faces a growing cost of living crisis and approximately 1.3 million adults remain without access to a basic bank account. With its proud tradition of high street commerce and community-minded credit unions, the UK is an ideal launchpad for COLHYBRI's mission.

whyMiami.title: Why the UK?
reasons: Approximately 1.3 million adults in the UK are without a basic bank account
67 million inhabitants — a large, diverse population with significant financially excluded communities
Thriving high street ecosystem with hundreds of thousands of independent local shops
Strong credit union tradition and growing demand for community-based financial solutions

forIndividuals.title: For Individuals
forIndividuals.headline: Financial Freedom Starts at £2.50/Month
forIndividuals.description: No bank account? No problem. COLHYBRI gives you access to essential financial services through your neighbourhood shops. Save, spend, and build your financial future — all for £2.50/month.

forShops.title: For Local Shops
forShops.headline: Your Shop, Your Community's Financial Hub
forShops.description: Join COLHYBRI for £8/month and transform your business into a community financial centre. Increase footfall, build customer loyalty, and make a real difference in your neighbourhood.

forCities.title: For Councils
forCities.headline: Revitalise the High Street with COLHYBRI
forCities.description: Local authorities partnering with COLHYBRI see measurable increases in local economic activity. Our platform strengthens the commercial fabric of neighbourhoods while advancing financial inclusion goals.

ecosystem.title: Ecosystem
ecosystem.headline: The COLHYBRI Ecosystem
ecosystem.description: COLHYBRI is part of the ONLYMORE Group, a proven technology company with $12.5M+ in annual recurring revenue and 520,000 active clients. Our ecosystem connects individuals, local shops, and local authorities.

investors.title: Investors
investors.headline: Invest in Financial Inclusion
investors.description: COLHYBRI combines proven unit economics ($12.5M+ ARR across ONLYMORE Group) with massive social impact. We're seeking partners who share our vision of financial inclusion through local commerce.

questions.a: COLHYBRI is a financial inclusion platform that connects financially excluded individuals with local shops through a £2.50/month subscription. It creates a community-powered financial ecosystem where money circulates locally, generating 2.5x economic value through the Keynesian multiplier effect.
COLHYBRI costs £2.50/month for individuals and £8/month for local shops. There are no hidden fees, no credit checks, and no minimum balance requirements.

questions.q: Do I need a bank account to use COLHYBRI?
questions.a: No. COLHYBRI is specifically designed for people who are financially excluded or lack access to mainstream banking. You can access financial services through participating local shops in your neighbourhood.

questions.q: Where is COLHYBRI launching in the UK?
questions.a: COLHYBRI is launching across the United Kingdom in 2026. The UK was chosen because of its significant financially excluded population — approximately 1.3 million adults without a bank account — and its vibrant high street commerce ecosystem.
COLHYBRI is created by ONLYMORE Group, led by founder and CEO Florent Gibert. ONLYMORE Group has $12.5M+ in annual recurring revenue and serves 520,000 active clients.

questions.q: What is the Keynesian multiplier effect?
questions.a: The Keynesian multiplier describes how money spent locally generates additional economic activity. With COLHYBRI, every £2.50 subscription creates approximately £6.25 in local economic value as money circulates through the community.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.headline: Get in Touch
contact.description: Interested in COLHYBRI? Whether you're an individual, a local shop owner, a council representative, or an investor, we'd love to hear from you.

footer.quote: "I am doing my part." — Native American Legend (The Hummingbird)

localStats.title: Local Impact in the United Kingdom
localStats.subtitle: Real economic data showing how COLHYBRI can transform your community.

thirdPlace.label: Trust & Loneliness Barometer
thirdPlace.headline: 1.4 Billion Adults Are Lonely. COLHYBRI Is the Digital Third Place.
thirdPlace.subheadline: Social trust is collapsing worldwide. Financial exclusion and loneliness feed each other. COLHYBRI builds community through financial inclusion.
